women.title: Mila Cashmere Boxy Crop Sweater
women.details: AN ANYTHING-BUT-BASIC CASHMERE PULLOVER.Once you go 100% cashmere, you don't go back. This impossibly soft crewneck has the flattering shape, thoughtful details, and quality construction to carry you from season to season.

women.title: Billie Chunky Knit Oversized Cashmere Cardigan
women.details: COZY UP. Luxuriously soft and perfectly oversized, the Billie Cashmere Boyfriend Cardigan is crafted from premium Mongolian cashmere with a boxy, relaxed fit for effortless comfort.

women.title: Risa Cashmere-Wool Button Down Coat
women.details: GRADE A CASHMERE. Italic uses ultra-fine Grade A cashmere harvested from Capra Hircus goats in Mongolia. Unlike lesser cashmere, ours won't lose its shape, softness, or fray.

women.title: Mila Cashmere Boxy Crop Sweater
women.details: AN ANYTHING-BUT-BASIC CASHMERE PULLOVER. Once you go 100% cashmere, you don't go back. This impossibly soft crewneck has the flattering shape, thoughtful details, and quality construction to carry you from season to season.

jewelry.title: 14k Solid Gold Diamond Eternity Band
jewelry.details: The eternity band is a classic style that speaks to refined elegance. This band features dazzling diamonds all the way around for a seamless sparkle. The 14k Solid Gold Diamond Eternity Band is spectacular on its own but can be stacked effortlessly with other pieces

jewelry.title: 14k Solid Gold Diamond Solitaire Bracelet
jewelry.details: Designed to catch the light and captivate, the 14k Solid Gold Diamond Solitaire Bracelet is the obvious choice for an everyday bracelet. This essential style can be worn alone or layered with other pieces.

jewelry.title: 14k Solid Gold Cultured Pearl Station Bracelet
jewelry.details: Five lustrous freshwater pearls add refined texture to this delicate 14k solid gold bracelet. Evenly scattered along a delicate strand, these eye-catching pearls are heirloom-worthy and designed to be worn every day. Layer this bracelet with another premium 14k gold jewelry from Italic for a stunning style statement. All Italic freshwater pearls are graded AA or AA+ and designed to be heirloom staples in your collection.

jewelry.title: 18k Solid Gold Dalton Diamond Tennis Bracelet
jewelry.details: A refined classic, the diamond tennis bracelet is a timeless addition to any jewelry collection. Each Dalton Diamond Tennis Bracelet is handcrafted with precision, taking multiple days to set and polish from start to finish. Cast from solid 18k gold and encrusted with dazzling diamonds, this piece is destined to be cherished for years to come.

jewelry.title: 14k Solid Gold Tube Hoop Earrings
jewelry.details: We combined a classic, pared-down aesthetic with 14k solid gold to create our timeless Tube Hoop Earrings. Made with forever in mind, these ultra-lightweight hoops are forged from solid gold (not plated or filled), which means they’ll never tarnish. Wear them all day, every day — they suit any situation.

jewelry.title: 14k Solid Gold Diamond Eternity Band
jewelry.details: The eternity band is a classic style that speaks to refined elegance. This band features dazzling diamonds all the way around for a seamless sparkle. The 14k Solid Gold Diamond Eternity Band is spectacular on its own but can be stacked effortlessly with other pieces.

jewelry.title: 14K Solid Gold Diamond Five-Stone Necklace
jewelry.details: The 14k Solid Gold Diamond Five-Stone Necklace features five lab-grown diamonds on a fine, 14k solid gold chain. The contemporary bezel settings nestle each diamond while still allowing every facet to catch the light. This is an enduring piece you’ll reach for whenever you need just the right amount of sparkle.

jewelry.title: 14K Solid Gold Diamond Five-Stone Necklace
jewelry.details: The 14k Solid Gold Diamond Five-Stone Necklace features five lab-grown diamonds on a fine, 14k solid gold chain. The contemporary bezel settings nestle each diamond while still allowing every facet to catch the light. This is an enduring piece you’ll reach for whenever you need just the right amount of sparkle.

jewelry.title: 14k Solid Gold Cultured Pearl Solitaire Necklace
jewelry.details: Radiant and effortlessly elegant, this pendant necklace can easily be layered up with other pieces or styled solo. A single freshwater pearl gracefully glides along a 14k solid gold chain, creating a timeless look for all seasons. All Italic freshwater pearls are graded AA or AA+ and designed to be heirloom staples in your collection.

jewelry.title: 14k Solid Gold Diamond & Cultured Pearl Drop Earrings
jewelry.details: Introducing a dazzling update to classic huggie hoop earrings. A row of brilliant-cut, high-clarity diamonds is set in 14k solid gold, highlighting a delicate cultured freshwater pearl. Show yours off at a special occasion or dress up an everyday look. All Italic freshwater pearls are graded AA or AA+ and designed to be heirloom staples in your collection.
